name: D&Dice
description:
❗ For the best experience, please download the game as the highscore system and lighting cannot work on the Web build. ❗ D&Dice was developed for GMTK GameJam 2022.

D&Dice is a fast-paced board/maze runner game.  You are playing in a Dungeons & Dragons-inspired tavern that has you solving puzzle boards. Every time you escape a board, a new one takes its place and its size is dictated by a dice roll (2->6).
